distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
The nameserver bind was updated to fix a remote denial of service
vulnerability, where a crafted packet could cause the nameserver to abort. (CVE-2016-2776, bsc#1000362)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4

notes.text: buffer.c in named in ISC BIND 9 before 9.9.9-P3, 9.10.x before 9.10.4-P3, and 9.11.x before 9.11.0rc3 does not properly construct responses, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via a crafted query.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
